extendedInfo.description: Catch the Christmas spirit with this Christmas Live Wallpaper and get ready for all those nostalgic memories that come along with it. Imagine sitting in your favorite chair on Christmas eve. Enjoy the warm glow of the fireplace and the festive flicker of the Christmas tree lights while listening to Christmas carols play softly in the background. Settings allow you to toggle music and set custom volume for wallpaper.- Support both Portrait and Landscape mode with pan / swipe- Cycles through different Christmas music.- Christmas nostalgic feel.- Toggle music and set independant wallpaper volume.

reviews.title: LOVE IT!
reviews.comment: The loveliest wallpaper ever! Thank you developers! It is totally AWESOME! Works great on my galaxy S3!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Some issues
reviews.comment: Will not loop with Apex Launcher like every other live wallpaper I own does with out issue.  No tap to toggle music, its on or off.  No real settings menu to customize anything.  Animations limited, at least animate the cats tale, etc.
reviews.author: A Google User
